This is an document tell about run_analysis.R script

The script combines the train data & test data & then select only columns which has mean & std in it & then groups 
them by subject & activity to calculate avg for each variable

This project contains 

1) readme.rmd  = this is readme markdown file

2)run_analysis.R = this is the R script

3)tidydata_output.txt = this is the output generated by R script

4)codebook = this tells the column details of output data generated by R script
